name: Fowl Feud: Quack of Dawn
description:
Only one flock can rule the pond. Engage in a three-lane battle with various baby birds against a friend or the AI!

Controls General: R to restart Escape to exit

Blue: A and S to change duck type S and W to change lane Left Shift to spawn Duck, Left Control to Upgrade.

Red: Left Arrow and Right Arrow to change duck type Up Arrow and Down Arrow to change lane Right Shift to spawn Right Control to Upgrade.
